title: Trends in children's books
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: An interview with Albert Ullin, winner of the 1986 Dromkeen Medal award for his contribution to children’s literature. He also talks about changes that have occurred in Australian children’s literature over the past twenty- five years
